item.title: Testing the CarEdge AI car negotiator
item.description: We put the CarEdge AI Negotiator to the test during a real negotiation. Here’s what worked, what didn’t, and key takeaways for buyers. Can AI really help negotiate a better deal?

item.title: Is paint protection worth the cost?
item.description: A practical look at paint protection options, including benefits, limitations, and when they make sense for your car. Clear guidance to help buyers decide with confidence. Is it right for your vehicle?

item.title: The return of the 2020 Wide-Body Challenger
item.description: We revisit the Dodge Challenger, exploring why it came back and what makes this version stand out. What sets the wide-body Challenger apart from other muscle cars?

item.title: Five cars to think twice about buying
item.description: A practical look at five vehicles that may come with ownership challenges, focusing on reliability, costs, and long-term value. What should buyers consider before making a decision?

item.title: What to know about Z06 pricing
item.description: A breakdown of pricing considerations for the Corvette Z06, including market trends, options, and value factors. What influences the final price of a Z06?

item.title: Selling a 33-Year-Old Car in Under 48 Hours
item.description: Follow the process of marketing and selling a well-kept classic vehicle in a short timeframe. What factors help an older car find the right buyer so quickly?

item.title: Four Things Not to Buy in the Finance Office
item.description: When buying a new or used car, some add-ons in the finance office may cost more than they’re worth. Which extras should you skip to make a smarter purchase?

item.title: The hardest states to buy a car
item.description: An overview of five U.S. states where buying a car can be more complex due to regulations, fees, and market conditions. What makes these states especially challenging for car buyers?

item.title: Why this classic still stands out today
item.description: A closer look at a car often praised for its design, engineering, and driving feel compared to modern vehicles. What qualities make some older cars feel better than today’s models?

item.title: How to properly use locking lug nuts
item.description: A step-by-step guide on using locking lug nuts correctly to protect wheels without causing damage. What common mistakes should drivers avoid during installation?

item.title: Fixing a small bumper dimple
item.description: Learn how a minor bumper dimple can be repaired using practical techniques that restore appearance and fit. When is a simple fix enough versus a full replacement?

item.title: Auction vehicles with bold color accents
item.description: A look at auction finds featuring bright hue accents, highlighting design details and overall condition. How do unique color choices affect vehicle appeal and value?

item.title: How dealers profit from down payments
item.description: A clear explanation of how down payments can affect dealer pricing, financing, and overall profit during a car purchase. What should buyers watch for when negotiating payment terms?

item.title: A budget brake job on a K1500
item.description: Follow a cost-conscious brake replacement on a K1500, breaking down parts, labor, and savings. What trade-offs come with completing a brake job on a tight budget?

item.title: How to avoid overpaying at a dealership
item.description: Practical guidance on navigating dealership pricing, fees, and negotiations to make informed car-buying decisions. Which steps can help protect buyers from unnecessary costs?

item.title: Thoughts on the asking price
item.description: A closer look at pricing considerations, value, and market context when evaluating a vehicle purchase. What factors should influence whether a price feels fair?

item.title: Concerns after buying a Corvette C8
item.description: An honest review of ownership concerns with a recently purchased Corvette C8, focusing on expectations, costs, and real-world experience. What should buyers consider before purchasing one?

item.title: Selling a high-value truck: the full breakdown
item.description: Follow the process of selling a truck valued at $78,000, including pricing strategy, buyer interest, and final outcome. What goes into closing a successful high-value vehicle sale?

item.title: Is buying a C8 worth it again?
item.description: An honest look at owning a Corvette C8, covering performance, ownership experience, and long-term value. What factors should you consider before buying one again?

item.title: A costly purchase and what it taught us
item.description: This video reflects on an expensive buying decision, examining lessons learned, budgeting considerations, and next steps. How can careful planning help avoid financial strain?
